long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Hubspot CRM Extension. Higlight any text on any website and search it for contacts, deals or companies instantly within your Hubspot CRM. Add leads to your Hubspot CRM with a few clicks: no need to switch between tabs.
